page.title: 11LIFE-STYLE/A PERSONAL VIEW.
page.content: This young couple live in Westerton, the smallest community in the block but with lives & backgrounds similar to many people living in the villages today; moving in for personal reasons but finding employment elsewhere-Chris is a long-distance lorry driver. Theirs is a small neat stone terraced house: small front garden & rear yard. Whilst enjoying the quietness they can sometimes be bored: of the some 60 res idents many are retired. However their parents are quite close: Vannessa's in B/Auckland have DIY business, Chris' a confectioners in Coundon. Westerton has no shop or pub, not even a mobile library, but there is a phone -box. Their doctor is at B/Auckland. Apart from TV & books, on Fri/Saturday they walk to the pub "two fields away" yet when asked about their live-style, "Yes we like it & we intend to stay".
